name: While you are Downloading
description: A quick and action paced retro styled arcade shooter, or shoot 'em up (shmup) if you like. Perfect to play in short chunks, like when you are waiting for big games to download.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 86 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 86 MB available space
